document.full_text: astronauts aboard the international space station pondered the future of american space flight on thursday as they neared the end of a decade-long project to build the $100 billion orbital outpost.
document.title: with space station nearly done, nasa looks ahead
lines_and_colors: astronauts aboard the international space station pondered the future of american space flight on thursday as they neared the end of a decade-long project to build the $100 billion orbital outpost.
